Topic.Title: One Soda Per Day Raises Diabetes Risk, Study Suggests

Message.Msg: "At Coca-Cola its profits first then your health" In the White House it is first destroy our futures for the benefit of Corp-America and the career politicians. What do you expect? I think most of the country has wised up and is ready to remove them all from office at the next meltdown, regardless of how many diversions homeland security and (the latest propaganda machines) plots they uncover. Us being killed by the dozens, pales in comparison in the murdering of the future of millions of US Citizens it has been part of for so long. Shares such topics of conversation at the dinner table.
